info.name: 2024 Epic Boon Feats
info.description: Epic Boon Feats from the 2024 Player's Handbook.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Peerless Aim. When you miss with an attack roll, you can hit instead. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Peerless Aim: When you miss with an attack roll, you can hit instead. Once per turn.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Blink Steps. Immediately after you take the Attack action or the Magic action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

sheet.description: Blink Steps: After Attack or Magic action, teleport up to 30 feet to unoccupied space you can see.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Energy Resistance. You have Resistance to two of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Poison, Psychic, Radiant, or Thunder. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your choices.

Energy Redirection. When you take damage of one of the types chosen for the Energy Resistances benefit, you can take a Reaction to direct damage of the same type toward another creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn't behind Total Cover. If you do so, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Constitution modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take damage equal to 2d12 plus your Constitution modifier.

sheet.description: You have Resistance to two of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Poison, Psychic, Radiant, or Thunder. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your choices. Energy Redirection: When you take damage of one of the types chosen for the Energy Resistances benefit, you can take a Reaction to direct damage of the same type toward another creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn't behind Total Cover. If you do so, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Constitution modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take damage equal to 2d12 plus your Constitution modifier.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Improve Fate. When you or another creature within 60 feet of you succeeds on or fails a D20 Test, you can roll 2d4 and apply the total rolled as a bonus or penalty to the d20 roll. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you roll Initiative or finish a Short or Long Rest.

sheet.description: Improve Fate: Roll 2d4 to modify D20 Tests within 60 feet. Once per encounter or rest.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Fortified Health. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 40. In addition, whenever you regain Hit Points, you can regain additional Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier. Once you've regained these additional Hit Points, you can't do so again until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever you regain Hit Points, you can regain additional Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier. Once you've regained these additional Hit Points, you can't do so again until the start of your next turn.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Overcome Defenses. The Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage you deal always ignores Resistance.

Overwhelming Strike. When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to the ability score increased by this feat. The extra damage's type is the same as the attack's type.

sheet.description: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage you deal ignores Resistance. When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to the ability score increased by this feat

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Last Stand. When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, You can drop to 1 Hit Point and regain a number of Hit Points equal to half your Hit Point maximum. Once you use this Benifit you can't use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Recover Vitality. You have a pool of ten d10s. As a Bonus Action you can expend dice from the pool, roll those dice, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll's total. You regain all the expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

sheet.description: Once per Long Rest, When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, You can drop to 1 Hit Point and regain {{hp:half}} Hit Points. You have a pool of ten d10s. As a Bonus Action you can expend dice from the pool and heal yourself equal to the roll's total. You regain all the expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.
All-Around Adept.. You gain proficiency in all skills.
Expertise. Choose one skill in which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in that skill.

sheet.description: You have gained proficiency in all skills and an Expertise.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Escape Artist. As a Bonus Action, you can take the Disengage action, which also ends the Grappled condition on you.
Quickness. Your Speed increases by 30 feet.

sheet.description: Escape Artist: Bonus Action Disengage also ends Grappled. Quickness: Speed increases by 30 feet.

Free Casting. Whenever you cast a spell with a level 1â€“4 spell slot, roll 1d4. If the number you roll is the same as the slot's level, the slot isn't expended.

sheet.description: Free Casting: Roll 1d4 when casting 1st-4th level spells. If roll matches slot level, slot isn't expended.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Merge with Shadows. While within Dim Light or Darkness, you can give yourself the Invisible condition as a Bonus Action. The condition ends on you immediately after you take an action, a Bonus Action, or a Reaction.
Shadowy Form. While within Dim Light or Darkness, you have Resistance to all damage except Psychic and Radiant.

sheet.description: Merge with Shadows: Bonus Action invisibility in dim light/darkness. Shadowy Form: Resistance to all damage except Psychic and Radiant in dim light/darkness.

ul.li: Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.
Truesight. You have Truesight with a range of 60 feet.
